TEI.2.document_title: Perry and Hunter to Stephen F Austin, 03-22-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with Perry and Hunter, March 22, 1833. Bill.

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with Perry and Hunter, March 22, 1833. Bill.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*In a/ with *person_mentioned*Perry and Hunter*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1833">1833*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-03-1833">Jany 11 */date_mentioned* For Ballance on a/ rendered____________ 1654.09*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-xx-1833">Mar. */date_mentioned* " Collecting 1670$ at 5 prct__________________ 83.50*/p*
*p*$1737.59*/p* *p*Contra Cr*/p*
*p*By house Rent 14 Mo @ 10$_____________________________ 140.00*/p*
*p*By Cash Recd. of *person_mentioned*J Lester*/person_mentioned*__________________ 3. 00*/p*
*p*By Amt recd. of *person_mentioned*Frank Lewis*/person_mentioned*__________________________ 16.25*/p*
*p*By Cash recd. of *person_mentioned*J. Lester*/person_mentioned* pd Note____________________ 7.00*/p*
*p*By Amt Recd, of*person_mentioned* Ducase*/person_mentioned*_______________________________ 82.00*/p*
*p*By Amt " " *person_mentioned*W Neu*/person_mentioned*______________________________ 15.00*/p*
*p*By " " " *person_mentioned*Jno. Austin*/person_mentioned*___________________1000.00 1263.25*/p*
*p*$474.84*/p*
*p*Recd. Draft on *person_mentioned*Messrs McKinstry and Austin*/person_mentioned* for the above Amt Four hundred and seventy four and 34/100 Dollars—*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="03-22-1833">Mar. 22, 1833*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Wm. W. Hunter*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
